page.title: 19Recreation - Canal Holidays
page.content: Public interest in waterways recreation and ameneties is greater than ever. In addition to cruising, the waterways provide for fishing, canoeing and walking. Local Authorities in conjunction with the British Waterways are restoring and maintaining the canal in order to extend the national cruising system. he section of canal passing throught the block is regularly dredged by a canal dredger. A small marina has been developed at Hassall Green. A shop, cafe and petrol pump supply the needs of the holiday makers who use the canal. A holiday barge can be hired from a variety of places on the canal. Here is a list of the ameneties provided on a 6 berth holiday barge for about 400 pounds a week. Television, cassette player, fridge, sleeping bags and fuel are included.
